title: Mapping the IscR regulon sheds light on the regulation of iron homeostasis in
authors: Dos Santos NM, Picinato BA, Santos LS, de Ara√∫jo HL, Balan A, Koide T, Marques MV
abstract: The role of the iron-sulfur [Fe-S] cluster transcriptional regulator IscR in maintaining [Fe-S] homeostasis in bacteria is still poorly characterized in many groups.
